The claim is "round 3 be the earliest round for a player to be taken from central florida". Since we found a player (Kevin Smith) from Central Florida who was drafted in the 3rd round, this means the claim is TRUE.

- { "row_index": 3, "column_name": "team" }
- { "row_index": 3, "column_name": "round" }
